about_the_game:
Ultimate Bondage Simulator is an adult-themed exploration and escape game set within a mysterious and dark facility. Players take on the role of a character who finds themselves bound and trapped in restrictive restraints such as latex suits, ballet boots, and armbinders. The objective? Escape the facility, but not without overcoming numerous obstacles, both physical and psychological.

In this immersive BDSM-themed experience, every move counts as you struggle against your restraints, explore the facility, and face off against domineering figures in an environment filled with intricate bondage, power dynamics, and strategic challenges. The game is designed to be both immersive and thrilling, with a focus on tension, control, and survival.

As players progress, they can interact with other test subjects, explore various environmental obstacles, and recharge their health, stamina, and more at specific points around the map. Ultimate Bondage Simulator is packed with mature content, including consensual BDSM, bondage aesthetics, and exploration of power dynamics.

Key Features:

  • Immersive Bondage Gameplay: Experience the sensation of being bound in tight restraints, with limited mobility and the need to struggle to escape.

  • Exploration & Interaction: Roam the facility, uncover hidden secrets, and interact with various test subjects and decorative bondage elements.

  • Tantalizers & Recharge Points: Stay fueled and healthy with Tantalizers and One Bar Prisons scattered throughout the map, marked on the minimap for easy access.

  • Realistic Struggling & Movement Mechanics: Fight against your restraints using a variety of movements, from crawling to jumping, with a stamina system.

  • Cinematic BDSM Art: Enjoy beautifully crafted environments filled with bondage art and sensual decorations that deepen the dark atmosphere of the game.

  • Adult-Themed Content: Includes BDSM, bondage, power dynamics, and intimate scenes.

Please note: This game is intended for mature audiences and contains explicit adult content. All activities within the game are consensual and follow a narrative based on dominance, submission, and escape mechanics.

content_descriptors.notes: Ultimate Bondage Simulator contains explicit adult content, including depictions of BDSM, bondage, and power dynamics. The game features graphic sexual content, including restraint play, and may include elements of domination and submission. There are no depictions of sexual assault or non-consensual acts; all content is consensual within the context of the game. Additionally, players may encounter themes of restraint, submission, and control. Please be advised that this game is intended for mature audiences only.

name: Ultimate Bondage Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5-1600 / Intel Core i5-7600K
  • Memory: 32 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 6GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Ultimate Bondage Simulator is an adult-themed escape game where you struggle to break free from restraints in a BDSM-inspired facility. Explore, interact, and survive in a thrilling, kinky world.
